intro: Ouratea sumatrana var. nervosa, commonly known as the Sumatran ouratea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Annonaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia, particularly Indonesia. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves with prominent venation, which is a key feature of the varietal name "nervosa." It produces small, greenish-white flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. The fruit is a fleshy berry that contains multiple seeds, contributing to its role in local ecosystems.
